item.title: YelpCamp website- Udemy Bootcamp by Colt Steele
item.description: Built a website using Node, Express, Mongo, HTML5, CSS3 and some bootstrap. Hosted it on heroku. Much thanks to Colt Steele, Ian and Rusty.

item.title: Banking application with Monitoring
item.description: As part of internship kickstart at Oyo Rooms, Hyderabad. Full stack development using Spring Boot and Thrift RPC framework.

item.title: Netflix Movie Recommendation System using Distributed Databases
item.description: Movie recommendation system using distributed database for faster processing. Database used is MongoDB and clusters are created using Apache Spark.

item.title: Website Deep Fingerprinting
item.description: Guessing which site are you visiting despite all your privacy filters and vpns using Deep Learning!

item.title: Feature Selection on Bug Prediction
item.description: As part of my Research Practice-I, under Prof. N. L. Bhanumurthy, I implemented Non Dominated Sort Genetic Algorithm (NSGA II) for Bug prediction model. The objective was to decide on best features to choose in order to predict bugs in a software. Will write more on it…

item.title: Named Entity Recognition using Deep Learning
item.description: As part of my Research Practice II under Prof N. L. Bhanumurthy, I implemented a state-of-the-art model for Named Entity Recognition. The purpose was exposure to subject. I deep dived into RNN, BiLSTM and CNN for this. I will write more about it later…
